languages.text: {n}Идира смотрит на Ардженту слегка растерянно, словно не ожидала от нее подобной мягкости.{/n} "Я согласна с сестричкой. Не от хорошей жизни люди повстанцами становятся. Да и шкет совсем зеленый, жалко губить зазря... Неладно что-то на Янусе, чуйкой чую — может, хоть он свет прольет на происходящее".

{n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира смотрит на Ардженту слегка растерянно, словно не ожидала от нее подобной мягкости.{/n} "Я согласна с сестричкой. Не от хорошей жизни люди повстанцами становятся. Да и шкет совсем зеленый, жалко губить зазря... Неладно что-то на Янусе, чуйкой чую — может, хоть он свет прольет на происходящее".

Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉有些困惑地看着阿洁塔，似乎没想到她居然会有如此温柔的一面。{/n}“在这个问题上，我同意咱们修女的观点。民众之所以会造反，绝对不是因为他们活得太幸福了。这孩子还嫩得像根草一样，要是就这样白白杀了他，那就太可惜了……我能感觉到加努斯不太对劲，说不定他可以告诉我们发生了什么事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉有些困惑地看着阿洁塔，似乎没想到她居然会有如此温柔的一面。{/n}“在这个问题上，我同意咱们修女的观点。民众之所以会造反，绝对不是因为他们活得太幸福了。这孩子还嫩得像根草一样，要是就这样白白杀了他，那就太可惜了……我能感觉到加努斯不太对劲，说不定他可以告诉我们发生了什么事情。”

languages.text: {n}Visiblement confuse, Idira se tourne vers Argenta, comme si elle ne s'attendait pas à tant de gentillesse de sa part.{/n} « Je suis d'accord avec la sœur. Les gens ne se rebellent pas parce que la vie est rose. Et le petit est encore jeune, ce serait dommage de le tuer pour rien... Quelque chose cloche sur Janus, je le sens. Il pourra peut-être nous en dire plus sur ce qu'il s'y passe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement confuse, Idira se tourne vers Argenta, comme si elle ne s'attendait pas à tant de gentillesse de sa part.{/n} « Je suis d'accord avec la sœur. Les gens ne se rebellent pas parce que la vie est rose. Et le petit est encore jeune, ce serait dommage de le tuer pour rien... Quelque chose cloche sur Janus, je le sens. Il pourra peut-être nous en dire plus sur ce qu'il s'y passe. »

languages.text: {n}Idira mira un tanto confusa a Argenta, como si no esperara semejante amabilidad.{/n} «Estoy de acuerdo con la hermana. La gente no se rebela porque la vida sea de color de rosas. Y este chaval está muy verde, sería una lástima matarlo por nada... Algo está podrido en el mundo de Janus, puedo sentirlo. Tal vez pueda explicarnos lo que está pasando».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira mira un tanto confusa a Argenta, como si no esperara semejante amabilidad.{/n} «Estoy de acuerdo con la hermana. La gente no se rebela porque la vida sea de color de rosas. Y este chaval está muy verde, sería una lástima matarlo por nada... Algo está podrido en el mundo de Janus, puedo sentirlo. Tal vez pueda explicarnos lo que está pasando».

languages.text: {n}イディラは困惑したようにアルジェンタを見つめる。まるで、そのような優しさを見せられることが意外だと言わんばかりだった。{/n}「あたいはシスターの意見に賛成よ。人生がバラのような色だからといって、必ずしも人は反逆するわけではないわ。そして、あの子は草のように青々としていた。殺すのはもったいないわ…ヤヌスは何かがおかしい。あたいはそう感じる…彼なら、何が起きているのかわかるかもね」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは困惑したようにアルジェンタを見つめる。まるで、そのような優しさを見せられることが意外だと言わんばかりだった。{/n}「あたいはシスターの意見に賛成よ。人生がバラのような色だからといって、必ずしも人は反逆するわけではないわ。そして、あの子は草のように青々としていた。殺すのはもったいないわ…ヤヌスは何かがおかしい。あたいはそう感じる…彼なら、何が起きているのかわかるかもね」

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt Argenta etwas verwirrt an, als habe sie ihr von keine solche Sanftheit erwartet.{/n} "Ich stimme der Schwester zu. Man wird nicht zum Rebellen, weil man ein ach so rosiges Leben hat. Und der Bursche ist hinter den Ohren grüner als Gras, es wäre doch ein Jammer, ihn wegen nichts und wieder nichts zu töten ... Auf Janus stimmt etwas nicht, das spüre ich. Vielleicht kann er Licht ins Dunkel bringen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt Argenta etwas verwirrt an, als habe sie ihr von keine solche Sanftheit erwartet.{/n} "Ich stimme der Schwester zu. Man wird nicht zum Rebellen, weil man ein ach so rosiges Leben hat. Und der Bursche ist hinter den Ohren grüner als Gras, es wäre doch ein Jammer, ihn wegen nichts und wieder nichts zu töten ... Auf Janus stimmt etwas nicht, das spüre ich. Vielleicht kann er Licht ins Dunkel bringen."

languages.text: {n}İdira, ondan böyle nazik şeyler duymayı beklemiyormuş gibi şaşırarak Argenta'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Rahibeyle aynı fikirdeyim. İnsanlar, hayatlarındaki her şey güllük gülistanlık olduğu için isyancı olmaz. Çocuğun çömezin teki olduğu da bariz. Onu boşu boşuna öldürürsek yazık olur. Janus'ta yanlış giden bir şeyler var, hissedebiliyorum. Belki o, neler olup bittiğine biraz olsun ışık tutabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at Argenta a little confused, as if she did not expect such gentleness from her.{/n} "I agree with the sister here. People don't become rebels because everything in their lives is rosy. And the kid's green as grass, it'd be a shame to kill him for nothing... Something is wrong on Janus, I can feel it — maybe he can shed some light on what's going on."

İnsanlar, hayatlarındaki her şey güllük gülistanlık olduğu için isyancı olmaz. Çocuğun çömezin teki olduğu da bariz. Onu boşu boşuna öldürürsek yazık olur.
